typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		Salary as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> employee
employee sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SchemaOutput.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
